google_play_reviews.content: Weird.. it says it wants to take 32 sound recordings a day on its own accord. Rack off. I just want to do 5 min bird counts in selected areas. I regret putting in my email address. NZ really needs a good app for this kind of monitoring. Deleted app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review Andrew. The normal use of the app is as a permanent bird monitor, but you can use it just for 5 minute bird counts. Chose disable recordings to stop the recordings through the day, then on the home screen is a 5 minute bird count button. The manual on the 2040 website gives more detail.
